a.title: Family Guides to Massachusetts Learning Standards

div.a: Family Guides to Massachusetts Learning Standards

nav.div: Salem Public Schools » Families » Remote Learning During School Closure

div.div:
Learning Opportunities During the COVID-19 School Closure The recent closure of our schools has been challenging for our families. We recognize that it is difficult to balance childcare, work, homeschooling, and keeping everyone in the family safe, happy, and healthy. To support you during this challenging time, Salem Public Schools has created a website for students and families to access learning resources.
To find remote learning resources that are available, please visit
www.salemlearns.org
New resources and learning opportunities will be added to this site on a daily and weekly basis.
Technical Support for Students and Families For technical support with remote learning resources, please follow the steps in the links below:
Tech Support for Students and Families (English)
Tech Support for Students and Families (Spanish)
Tech Support for Students and Families (Portuguese)
29 Highland Ave, Salem, MA 01970 | Phone 978 740-1212 | Fax 978 740-3083
